# coder state pull

Pull a Terraform state file from a workspace.

## Usage

```console
coder state pull <workspace> [file] [flags]
```

## Flags

### --build, -b

Specify a workspace build to target by name.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>0</code> |
